name: Who Am I?
content: I'm a UI/UX Front-end developer and an artist at heart with a love for writing code. I recently graduated from the University of Houston with a Bachelor's in Computer Science. My passion lies in designing and developing websites with modern, cutting-edge frameworks.

name: What drives me?
content: I find solace in the intersection of art and functionality. My belief is that every website tells a story, and my goal is to bring your brand's narrative to life through captivating design. The thrill of turning concepts into interactive realities is what keeps me fueled.

Additionally, I love researching and studying graphic design in my free time to help advance my career as a web developer. I'm constantly seeking new knowledge and techniques to improve my abilities and create even more amazing designs. Let's work together to create a website that truly represents your brand and captivates your audience!
